distinct

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into mst_user (employee_no, name, name_kana, department, tel_no, mail_adress, age, gender, position, account_level, retire_date, register_date, update_date, delete_flag) values (#{employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name_kana,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail_adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retire_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{register_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{update_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delete_flag,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update mst_user
employee_no = #{row.employee_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{row.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_kana = #{row.name_kana,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{row.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel_no = #{row.tel_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_date = #{row.update_date,jdbcType=DATE},

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT employee_no, name, name_kana, department, tel_no, mail_adress, age, gender, position, account_level, retire_date, register_date, update_date, delete_flag FROM Mst_User WHERE delete_flag = False ORDER BY employee_no ASC

SELECT employee_no, name, name_kana, department, tel_no, mail_adress, age, gender, position, account_level, retire_date, register_date, update_date, delete_flag FROM MST_USER WHERE employee_no = #{employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT name FROM MST_USER WHERE delete_flag = false
